explains: v. 引诱，诱惑；怂恿，利诱；冒……的风险

sentences.en: Cars like that may tempt drivers to speed.
sentences.cn: 那样的汽车可能会引诱司机超速行驶。

sentences.en: Vivien refuses to put down bait to tempt wildlife to the waterhole.
sentences.cn: 维维恩拒绝放饵到水坑引诱野生动物。

sentences.en: Nothing could tempt her to evil.
sentences.cn: 什么也不能引诱她做坏事。
